Legal_Issue: Availability of state protection in country of origin
Legal_Provision: Section 97(1) of IRPA â€“ Basis for refugee protection
Key_Factor_in_Determination: Insufficient effort to pursue formal investigation with Colombian Ministry of Defence
Proceeding_Type: Refugee claim before the IRB, followed by judicial review
Application_Error: Failure to provide Colombian authorities a reasonable opportunity to investigate
Evidence_Ignored: Applicant's additional affidavit (struck due to procedural issues)
Legal_Standard: Burden on claimant to show state protection is unavailable
Application_Factor: Presumption of state protection in democratic countries
Decision_Review_Issue: Whether the Board erred in finding insufficient efforts to access state protection
Governing_Rule_or_Provision: Presumption of state protection unless rebutted by clear evidence

Procedural_Fairness: Procedural requirements enforced regarding submission of evidence
Legal_Defense_or_Challenge: Claimant argued state protection was ineffective

Omission_Type: Failure to pursue formal investigation with national authorities
